title: Autism and Me by Lia Filby
description: Autism and Me by Lia Filby. Read by Rhiannon Neads from the BBC Radio Drama Company. A Top 50 shortlisted story from BBC Radio 2's 500 WORDS 2015 competition, in the 9 and Under category.
